alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 01 at 2:58PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...POTENTIALLY IMPACTFUL ACCUMULATING SNOW NEXT WEEK... With the next system on Monday into Tuesday, forecast guidance continues to show the possibility of significant accumulating snow for the Northern Lynn Canal area. The main factor that would hinder the possibility of accumulating snow right now is how fast does the warm air move up Lynn Canal and reach the Haines and Skagway area. If this surge is slower to move up the canal, there is a chance that snow accumulations could be greater than what is currently forecasted. If the warm air surge happens faster than what is expected, snow accumulations will be limited and the area would see more rain during this time. Stay turned. As always, the latest forecast information can be found at www.weather.gov/Juneau.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway
